div.bibl: Chicago Greek Daily, Aug. 10, 1930KORAES. GREEK-AMERICAN AFTERNOON SCHOOL. CHICAGO HEIGHTS, ILL.

body.p: All lovers of music, and parents, guardians, teachers, and priests of Chicago and vicinity, are invited to the Koraes School to honor with their presence the annual graduation exercises of the school to take place in the hall of the church, 1501 Center Avenue, Sunday, August3,2:30 P.M. Prizes will be given.
